mapper.select: select c.* from content_info c where c.id=#{id} and c.enable=1

SELECT c.id, c.title,c.photo_url,c.`read_count` as `read`,c.create_time,c.source,c.comment_count,u.create_time favorite_time from content_info c right join user_collect_info u on c.id=u.c_id and u.type=1 where c.enable=1 and u.user_id=#{userId} order by u.create_time desc
